title: Firefox opening two windows at startup
content: Firefox is now opening two windows at startup: one that has my previous session (which I always prefer) and one window with one blank tab. It used to open only the saved session. What can I do do change this. Thank you. (I have Firefox 122 version)
creator: VegRunner66

title: Scroll bar issue
content:
Firefox has an issue with the scroll bar on certain websites which makes it befin flashing and creeping towards the top of the page on some websites (See attached gif). This is particularly an issue on whilst logged into my university study portal.

I have already troubleshooted this by: - Disabling add-on's - Deactivating smooth scrolling - Deactivating auto-scrolling - Deactivating enhanced tracking protection. Nothing has resolved the issue.
creator: 3liot

title: Two devices can’t be separated by Sync in Mozilla account
content:
I am logged into my Mozilla account on four devices: Laptop Linux, Desktop Linux, Desktop Windows, Phone Android. However, when I try “Send tab to device” or list the devices in the account settings, the two Linux devices are not shown separately, so I can’t send a tab from Laptop Linux to Desktop Linux or vice versa. In fact, when I edit the Device name on either of the Linux device, that name will also be shown on the other device.

How is this possible? How can I disentangle the two devices?
creator: albrights

title: Firefox won't start
content: I tried downloading a fresh copy of Firefox, but it didn't help. I also tried starting in Troubleshooting mode. Here's the ID of one of the crash reports: 790A4DDA-72FA-44A6-BF81-E6F8D126D507

title: Entrei com minha conta no firefox, e foi criada outra.
content:
Bom dia pessoal, reinstalei meu firefox e fui entrar com minha conta para sincronizar meus favoritos, e foi criada outra conta?

Sumiu todo meu conteúdo salvo da sincronização como se eu tivesse feito outra conta. Eu formatei meu computador, e antes disso eu tinha feito a sincronização para salvar tudo, mas após a instalação do firefox, estava o botão para cadastrar ou entrar, nesse caso eu coloquei os dados da minha conta, email, senha repetir senha e a idade, mas foi feito outra conta, como se a minha antiga tivesse sumido todo conteúdo. Perdi todo meu conteúdo salvo.
creator: wandio

title: Firefox uses high cpu frequency for some website when my device runs from power adapter
content: Firefox uses below 2ghz CPU speed when my laptop runs from battery when I'm watching YouTube videos and browsing. But YouTube when power adapter is ON, Firefox uses above 2Ghz speed when watching YouTube videos and browsing some web sites.
creator: lakshan1

title: Unbearably slow on several forum pages and someone's blogger page (taking minutes to load)
content:
Hi,

I tried to visit the following pages in Firefox 121 (running under Arch Linux) and they took minutes to load. They loaded in a fraction of a second in Chromium. Anyone have any idea what is wrong?

The blogger page is here: https://u-blox-ninaw-platformio.blogspot.com/2022/03/u-blox-nina-w-e-platformio-arduino.html

Here are a few forums that take minutes to load, I think they use the same engine as I see the same colorful loading animation: https://community.platformio.org/t/error-please-specify-upload-port/26218 https://forum.manjaro.org/

Does anyone have any idea what is happening or what I should do to alert the development team? Are these sites using technology not implemented in Firefox?

Best Regards,

Kevin
creator: kevin249

title: Firefox browser v 122.0.1 won't display Netbank Upcoming payments
content:
In Commonwealth Bank Netbank with Windows 10, when I attemp to check future payments I have set up, I get an error message after waiting some time while a message "Loading" is displayed, stating "Sorry we are unable to find the page you were looking for due to a technical problem". Cleraing cookies and cache makes no difference.

This problem does not occur with Google Chrome.
